comment.author: 82862615@N00
comment._content:
Wikipedia's caption on the photo says this:
This is a photo of driver Mel Marquette's wrecked McFarlan racing car at the 1912 Indianapolis 500. Marquette finished 19th in the race, two places ahead of Eddie Rickenbacker, who was put out of the race with a broken intake valve.
Reference: Wikipedia: McFarlan Automobile
